pages.text: What is limonite, you say? And how does it help you get iron? Well, limonite IS a form of iron. If you could get some, there might be a way to turn it into a much more refined form of iron. Just one problem: limonite is quite rare.
pages.title: What is Limonite?

pages.text: Limonite can only be found in one place: the swamp. If you haven't found a swamp, you might need to start looking. Though limonite is scarce, other sources of iron are even scarcer.
pages.title: The Hunt Begins!

pages.text: Now that you've arrived at a swamp, you can start looking for limonite. It is generally found at the bottom of bodies of water. However, you may notice it comes in three forms: $(#55cc55)rich$(), normal, and $(#cc5555)poor$(). As the names suggest, rich ore contains the most iron, and poor the least.
pages.title: The Rich and The Poor

pages.text: Now that you have limonite, $(l:age1/6metalchamber)read on$() to learn how to convert it to usable iron!
pages.title: The Next Step
